fun_moment.text: The time Flam ate one of the Mulch Island chillies!

about.fun_fact: Loves building and decorating sand castles!
about.text: This dapper decorator is always on the lookout for a perfect pad. He travels the Binscape searching for the most interesting and lavishly-decorated nests to feature in his interior design magazine, Best Nest. When heâ€™s not working, he enjoys long holidays on the beach.
